bug.author: bluesky314
bug.description:
wandb --version && python --version && uname
Weights and Biases version: Latest Python version: 3 Operating System:Linux
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Not initialising <denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>`wandb.init(project="matting-disEntangleRes34DIM") `gives me error : </denchmark-code>
Traceback (most recent call last): File "disentangleNetDIMBlock.py", line 51, in wandb.init(project="matting-disEntangleRes34DIM") File "/opt/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/init.py", line 1067, in init _init_headless(run) File "/opt/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/init.py", line 306, in _init_headless stdout_redirector = io_wrap.FileRedirector(sys.stdout, stdout_slave) File "/opt/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/io_wrap.py", line 331, in init self._from_fd = redir_file.fileno() AttributeError: 'IOBuffer' object has no attribute 'fileno' <denchmark-code></denchmark-code>
It is working on my other machine but not this one, I am thinking maybe some requirment is off?

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bluesky314>@bluesky314</denchmark-link> thanks for reporting. I created a branch that fixes this. You can try it by running , we should get it out in the next release next week.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vanpelt>@vanpelt</denchmark-link> Am still getting exact same error. Could there be some other cause of this?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bluesky314>@bluesky314</denchmark-link> my appologies, I gave you the wrong git branch. This branch fixes it:

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vanpelt>@vanpelt</denchmark-link> Ok that error has disappeared but now nothing is getting logged. When I go to the project link provided I see the page :"Not Found: We couldnt find what you were looking for". The project does not appear on my project dashboard as well.
Can you share the links that are being logged?

Sure here is the one it gave me on the python terminal: <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/bluesky314/XResNetDisentagleNet/runs/n3frcyzw>https://app.wandb.ai/bluesky314/XResNetDisentagleNet/runs/n3frcyzw</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vanpelt>@vanpelt</denchmark-link> My bad it is working, I was logged out on my browser. Maybe there should be a page saying please log in or no acess to make the situation a bit more clear.
I see, yeah we display a 404 to avoid leaking the existence of private usernames / projects. We should make the 404 page say if you own this project please login.
